___type.description: Type of the feature. could be mRNA, CDS, or similar

___start.description: Gene start position (one-based, following GFF format)

___seqid.description: Sequence on which the coordinates below are valid. Could be viral segment, bacterial contig, etc

___end.description: Gene end position (one-based closed, last position of feature, following GFF format)

title: JSON object for the `annotations` key, typically produced by `augur translate`
